column5: The Saltwater Breeze is a place to relax and revive. Located on a saltwater canal, within 20 minutes of Surfside Beach. At the Saltwater Breeze you and your family and friends can fish, crab for blue crabs or simply read a book in the hammock. A scenic drive down Bluewater Highway will lead you to a day of adventures in Galveston, Tx.  If you need a big city excursion, Houston is only an hour away.
column8: Saltwater Breeze Hide-A-Way on the Gulf
